optimization_lever.description: Add same-rank/identical-shape fast paths in broadcast_shape
optimization_lever.rationale: Stride-tricks and broadcast planning repeatedly merge same-rank shapes; bypassing reverse-index lookups and reverse() cuts per-call overhead while preserving merge semantics.
optimization_lever.risk_note: Fast paths only restructure shape-merge control flow; incompatibility detection and error-class behavior are unchanged.

isomorphism.ordering_tiebreak_note: Fast paths only short-circuit identical shapes and same-rank axis merges; right-aligned broadcast semantics and incompatibility error behavior remain behavior-isomorphic.

quality_gates.command: rch exec -- cargo run -p fnp-conformance --bin generate_packet006_optimization_report

rch exec -- cargo run -p fnp-conformance --bin run_workflow_scenario_gate -- --log-path artifacts/phase2c/FNP-P2C-006/workflow_scenario_packet006_opt_e2e.jsonl --artifact-index-path artifacts/phase2c/FNP-P2C-006/workflow_scenario_packet006_opt_artifact_index.json --report-path artifacts/phase2c/FNP-P2C-006/workflow_scenario_packet006_opt_reliability.json --retries 0 --flake-budget 0 --coverage-floor 1.0

notes: Profile report captures baseline/rebaseline distributions with environment fingerprint and reproducibility command.
Isomorphism checks cover identical-shape short-circuit, same-rank axiswise merges, rank mismatch handling, and incompatible-shape rejection parity.
Optimization accepted under EV gate with score 24.0 and no observed behavior drift.
Post-change workflow scenario gate rerun passed with 298/298 cases and coverage_ratio=1.0.
